content: here s a bobble stitch wall hanging design that s perfect for christmas but versatile enough to last all winter long framed at the top and bottom by plaid in shades of black gray and white a popular holiday trend i used two different brands of acrylic yarn for my sample because i was trying to use stash yarn but that s not required of course i used a strong stick from my yard for the dowel but you could use a regular wooden dowel found at most craft stores and while i embellished mine with tassels you could do fringe instead make it your own
